article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: Nov. 14 (Bloomberg) -- Dan Holden, security director at Arbor Networks, discusses the new hacking tool that targets Healthcare.gov with Julie Hyman and Adam Johnson on Bloomberg Television's "Street Smart." (Source: Bloomberg)

og.description: Nov. 14 (Bloomberg) -- Dan Holden, security director at Arbor Networks, discusses the new hacking tool that targets Healthcare.gov with Julie Hyman and Adam Johnson on Bloomberg Television's "Street Smart." (Source: Bloomberg)
og.title: The New Hacking Tool: `Destroy Obamacare'
